ResourceLoader

private ResourceLoader()
Constructs a new ResourceLoader. Since this is a singleton, this is only called once, from within a static method.

getInstance

Returns the singleton instance of this class.

getImage

public java.awt.Image getImage(java.lang.String key)
Gives you the Image corresponding to the specified key. Currently the path is used as the key. When I think of a nicer way to do this, I'll do it.

getStream

public java.io.InputStream getStream(java.lang.String key)
Gives you an InputStream corresponding to the specified key. Currently the path is used as the key. When I think of a nicer way to do this, I'll do it.
